dcterms:creator: J. Hentschel
M. Neuwirth
M. Rohrmeier
dcterms:description: The dataset contains annotated scores, harmony, and cadence for Mozart's piano sonatas, providing a rich resource for music analysis and research.
dcterms:title: Mozart Piano Sonatas Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Mauch
C. Cannam
M. Davies
S. Dixon
C. Harte
S. Kolozali
D. Tidhar
dcterms:description: The Isophonics dataset provides audio-aligned annotations for various musical segments, facilitating research in music information retrieval.
dcterms:title: Isophonics

dcterms:creator: E. J. Humphrey
J. Salamon
O. Nieto
J. Forsyth
R. M. Bittner
J. P. Bello
dcterms:description: JAMS is a JSON-based format for encoding music annotations, supporting various music object types and facilitating reproducible research in music information retrieval.
dcterms:title: JAMS (Annotated Music Specification for Reproducible MIR Research)

dcterms:creator: V. Eremenko
E. Demirel
B. Bozkurt
X. Serra
dcterms:description: Jaah is an audio-aligned jazz harmony dataset that provides annotations for jazz harmony, useful for music analysis and machine learning applications.
dcterms:title: Jaah (Audio-aligned jazz harmony dataset)

dcterms:creator: M. Neuwirth
D. Harasim
F. C. Moss
M. Rohrmeier
dcterms:description: The Annotated Beethoven Corpus (ABC) is a dataset containing harmonic analyses of all Beethoven string quartets, providing valuable insights for musicological research.
dcterms:title: The Annotated Beethoven Corpus (ABC)
